name: KALPANA RURAL AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT SOCIETY

address: H NO 22-1-2 KONAPETA DHONE KURNOOL DT ANDHRAPRADESH PIN 518222

briefDescription: KRUDS  is  a  non-governmental  organisation  (NGO)   established  in the  year  2000  for  the  benefit  of  mankind  especially for the  economically and  socially  backward  rural  people.  Over  the  past  14 years,  we  have  worked to  identify  and  meet  the needs  and  aspirations  of  the  rural  poor  through  participatory  approaches  for  development in 135 villages of KURNOOL district selected taluks.   Main thrust area of the organisation is social, education, economical development of neglected women and children of most backward communities and minorities through organising the women into groups and federation; provided varies, training, exposure and workshops on leadership, For Child integrated development organisation
